frontmatter.title: Nowhere to SSH: my journey into the Serverless world
frontmatter.description: I migrated a small real-world app from Express + MongoDB to Now + Firebase. I'm happy I was able to do it in ~10 hours and I don’t need to maintain or spend money on servers (at least for now).
